description.zh-cn: 中国药物化学家，中国中医科学院终身研究员兼首席研究员。她发现了青蒿素和双氢青蒿素，是20世纪热带医学的显著突破，因此获得2015年诺贝尔生理学或医学奖、共和国勋章等荣誉。她被誉为“三无教授”（无博士学位、无海外留学经历、无两院院士头衔）。
description.en: A Chinese pharmaceutical chemist and lifelong chief researcher at the China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences. She discovered artemisinin and dihydroartemisinin, a significant breakthrough in 20th-century tropical medicine, for which she was awarded the 2015 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine and the Medal of the Republic. She is known as the 'three-without professor' (no doctorate, no overseas study experience, no membership in the Chinese academies).

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦的丈夫，曾在北京的钢铁研究院工作，教授级高级工程师，是屠呦呦在宁波效实中学的同学。
description.en: Tu Youyou's husband, who worked at the Central Iron and Steel Research Institute in Beijing as a professor-level senior engineer. He was Tu Youyou's classmate at Xiaoshi High School in Ningbo.

en: China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国卫生部直属的科研机构，前身为中医研究院。
description.en: A research institution directly under the Ministry of Health of the People's Republic of China, formerly known as the Academy of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所著名医学院校。1952年由北京大学医学院独立出来，更名为北京医学院，2000年与北京大学合并，成为北京大学医学部。
description.en: A renowned medical school in China. It became independent from Peking University Medical School in 1952 and was renamed Beijing Medical College. In 2000, it merged with Peking University to become the Peking University Health Science Center.

description.zh-cn: 位于浙江宁波的一所中学，屠呦呦曾在此就读。
description.en: A high school located in Ningbo, Zhejiang, which Tu Youyou attended.

description.zh-cn: 位于浙江宁波的一所中学，屠呦呦于1951年于此毕业。
description.en: A high school located in Ningbo, Zhejiang, from which Tu Youyou graduated in 1951.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一种由屠呦呦及其团队发现的抗疟疾药物，其发现是20世纪热带医学的重大突破，挽救了数百万人的生命。
description.en: An antimalarial drug discovered by Tu Youyou and her team. Its discovery was a major breakthrough in 20th-century tropical medicine, saving millions of lives.

description.zh-cn: 由屠呦呦及其团队发现的一种抗疟疾药物，是青蒿素的衍生物。
description.en: An antimalarial drug discovered by Tu Youyou and her team, which is a derivative of artemisinin.

description.zh-cn: 一种由寄生虫引起的、最具毁灭性的疾病之一，屠呦呦的发现为治疗该疾病提供了革命性的疗法。
description.en: One of the most devastating parasitic diseases, for which Tu Youyou's discovery provided a revolutionary therapy.

nodes.id: 诺贝尔生理学或医学奖

zh-cn: 诺贝尔生理学或医学奖
en: Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine

description.zh-cn: 诺贝尔奖的一个奖项，旨在表彰在生理学或医学领域作出重要发现的科学家。屠呦呦于2015年获得该奖项。
description.en: One of the Nobel Prizes, awarded to scientists who have made significant discoveries in the fields of physiology or medicine. Tu Youyou received this award in 2015.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理，他组建了旨在寻找抗疟药物的“523项目”。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China, who established 'Project 523' to find antimalarial drugs.

description.zh-cn: 由时任中国国务院总理周恩来组建的旨在寻找抗疟药物的秘密军事科研项目，屠呦呦曾担任其中一个研究组的组长。
description.en: A secret military research project established by then-Premier Zhou Enlai to find antimalarial drugs, in which Tu Youyou served as the leader of a research group.

description.zh-cn: 中国晋代炼丹家、医药学家，其著作《肘后备急方》启发了屠呦呦发现青蒿素的提取方法。
description.en: A Chinese alchemist and medical expert of the Jin dynasty whose work 'A Handbook of Prescriptions for Emergencies' inspired Tu Youyou's method for extracting artemisinin.

en: A Handbook of Prescriptions for Emergencies

description.zh-cn: 中国晋代葛洪编撰的古代医学典籍，其中关于青蒿的记载启发了屠呦呦使用低温提取法发现了青蒿素。
description.en: An ancient medical text compiled by Ge Hong during the Jin dynasty in China. Its record of 'qinghao' inspired Tu Youyou to use a low-temperature extraction method, leading to the discovery of artemisinin.

description.zh-cn: 中药学家，曾是屠呦呦在中医研究院中药研究所的老师。
description.en: A pharmacognosist who was Tu Youyou's teacher at the Institute of Chinese Materia Medica, Academy of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关，将2016年度国家最高科学技术奖授予屠呦呦。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China, which awarded the 2016 National Highest Science and Technology Award to Tu Youyou.

en: National Highest Science and Technology Award

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆科学界的最高荣誉。屠呦呦于2017年获得2016年度该奖项。
description.en: The highest honor in the scientific community of mainland China. Tu Youyou received the 2016 award in 2017.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代诗歌开端，最早的一部诗歌总集。屠呦呦的名字源自其中“呦呦鹿鸣，食野之蒿”的诗句。
description.en: The earliest collection of Chinese poetry and the beginning of Chinese poetic tradition. Tu Youyou's name was inspired by the line 'Youyou the deer cry, eating the artemisia of the wild'.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦的舅舅，一位财政金融家，屠呦呦幼年时曾居住于其居所内。
description.en: Tu Youyou's uncle, a financier. Tu Youyou lived in his residence during her childhood.

description.zh-cn: 爱尔兰生物学家，因发现治疗蟠尾丝虫症的药物与大村智和屠呦呦共同获得2015年诺贝尔生理学或医学奖。
description.en: An Irish biologist who, along with Satoshi Ōmura and Tu Youyou, was awarded the 2015 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine for his discoveries concerning a novel therapy against Onchocerciasis.

description.zh-cn: 日本生物化学家，因发现治疗蟠尾丝虫症的药物与威廉·C·坎贝尔和屠呦呦共同获得2015年诺贝尔生理学或医学奖。
description.en: A Japanese biochemist who, along with William C. Campbell and Tu Youyou, was awarded the 2015 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine for his discoveries concerning a novel therapy against Onchocerciasis.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主席，于2019年授予屠呦呦共和国勋章。
description.en: President of the People's Republic of China, who awarded the Medal of the Republic to Tu Youyou in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高荣誉勋章，屠呦呦于2019年获得该勋章。
description.en: The highest order of honor of the People's Republic of China. Tu Youyou was awarded the medal in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华人民共和国国务院总理，在屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖后致函祝贺。
description.en: Then-Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, who sent a letter of congratulations after Tu Youyou won the Nobel Prize.

description.zh-cn: 微软创办人，将屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖列入其个人发表的“2015年6大好消息”之一。
description.en: Founder of Microsoft, who listed Tu Youyou's Nobel Prize win as one of his 'Top 6 Good-News Stories of 2015'.

description.zh-cn: 美国最高学术荣誉团体之一，屠呦呦于2025年当选为该院外籍院士。
description.en: One of the highest academic honorary societies in the United States. Tu Youyou was elected as a foreign associate in 2025.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国浙江省的城市，是屠呦呦的出生地。
description.en: A city in Zhejiang Province, China, and the birthplace of Tu Youyou.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦的丈夫是李廷钊，两人曾是宁波效实中学的同学。
description.en: Tu Youyou's husband is Li Tingzhao; they were classmates at Xiaoshi High School in Ningbo.

description.zh-cn: 1948年春，屠呦呦进入效实中学学习。
description.en: In the spring of 1948, Tu Youyou began studying at Xiaoshi High School.

description.zh-cn: 1950年，屠呦呦转入宁波中学并于1951年毕业。
description.en: In 1950, Tu Youyou transferred to Ningbo High School and graduated in 1951.

description.zh-cn: 1951年考入北京大学医学院（后更名为北京医学院），1955年毕业。
description.en: She was admitted to Peking University Medical School (later renamed Beijing Medical College) in 1951 and graduated in 1955.

position.zh-cn: 终身研究员兼首席研究员

description.zh-cn: 1955年毕业后被分配到卫生部直属的中医研究院（后更名为中国中医科学院）中药研究所工作。
description.en: After graduating in 1955, she was assigned to work at the Institute of Chinese Materia Medica of the Academy of Traditional Chinese Medicine (later renamed the China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences), which was directly under the Ministry of Health.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Tu Youyou is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 2025年当选美国国家科学院外籍院士。
description.en: Elected as a foreign associate of the U.S. National Academy of Sciences in 2025.

description.zh-cn: 刚参加工作时，屠呦呦作为研究实习员与老师楼之岑副教授一起研究中药。
description.en: When she first started working, Tu Youyou, as a research intern, studied Chinese medicine with her teacher, Associate Professor Lou Zhicen.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦于1930年12月30日出生于浙江宁波。
description.en: Tu Youyou was born on December 30, 1930, in Ningbo, Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 1969年1月，国务院总理周恩来组建了北京中药研究所523项目组，旨在寻找抗疟药物。
description.en: In January 1969, Premier Zhou Enlai established the Project 523 group at the Beijing Institute of Chinese Materia Medica to search for antimalarial drugs.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦被任命为523项目在北京中药研究所的小组组长。
description.en: Tu Youyou was appointed as the group leader of Project 523 at the Beijing Institute of Chinese Materia Medica.

description.zh-cn: 葛洪编撰了《肘后备急方》。
description.en: Ge Hong authored 'A Handbook of Prescriptions for Emergencies'.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦从《肘后备急方》中“青蒿一握，以水二升渍，绞取汁，尽服之”的记载获得灵感，改用低温乙醚萃取方法，最终成功发现了青蒿素。
description.en: Inspired by the description in 'A Handbook of Prescriptions for Emergencies' — 'a handful of qinghao, soaked in two sheng of water, wring out the juice, and drink it all' — Tu Youyou switched to a low-temperature ether extraction method and successfully discovered artemisinin.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦是抗疟药青蒿素的发现者。
description.en: Tu Youyou is the discoverer of the antimalarial drug artemisinin.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦是抗疟药双氢青蒿素的发现者。
description.en: Tu Youyou is the discoverer of the antimalarial drug dihydroartemisinin.

description.zh-cn: 青蒿素是治疗疟疾的特效药，挽救了数百万名疟疾患者的生命。
description.en: Artemisinin is a highly effective drug for treating malaria, saving the lives of millions of malaria patients.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦通过发现青蒿素，为对抗疟疾做出了卓越贡献。
description.en: Tu Youyou made outstanding contributions to the fight against malaria through her discovery of artemisinin.

relationships.source: 诺贝尔生理学或医学奖

description.zh-cn: 2015年10月5日，屠呦呦因在研制青蒿素等抗疟药方面的卓越贡献，被授予诺贝尔生理学或医学奖。
description.en: On October 5, 2015, Tu Youyou was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine for her outstanding contributions to the development of antimalarial drugs such as artemisinin.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 2017年1月9日，中华人民共和国国务院将2016年度国家最高科学技术奖授予屠呦呦。
description.en: On January 9, 2017, the State Council of the People's Republic of China awarded the 2016 National Highest Science and Technology Award to Tu Youyou.

description.zh-cn: 2019年9月17日，中华人民共和国主席习近平授予屠呦呦共和国勋章。
description.en: On September 17, 2019, President of the People's Republic of China Xi Jinping awarded the Medal of the Republic to Tu Youyou.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦的名字源自《诗经》中的诗句“呦呦鹿鸣，食野之蒿”。
description.en: Tu Youyou's name comes from the line 'Youyou the deer cry, eating the artemisia of the wild' in the Classic of Poetry.

description.zh-cn: 姚庆三是屠呦呦的舅舅，屠呦呦幼年曾居住于其家中。
description.en: Yao Qingsan is Tu Youyou's uncle, in whose house she lived during her childhood.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦与威廉·C·坎贝尔、大村智共同获得2015年诺贝尔生理学或医学奖。
description.en: Tu Youyou shared the 2015 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine with William C. Campbell and Satoshi Ōmura.

description.zh-cn: 屠呦呦与威廉·C·坎贝尔、大村智共同获得2015年诺贝尔生理学或医学奖。
description.en: Tu Youyou shared the 2015 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine with William C. Campbell and Satoshi Ōmura.

description.zh-cn: 在屠呦呦获得诺贝尔奖后，时任国务院总理李克强致函祝贺。
description.en: After Tu Youyou won the Nobel Prize, then-Premier Li Keqiang sent a letter of congratulations.

description.zh-cn: 2015年12月18日，微软创办人比尔·盖茨将“屠呦呦等人获得诺贝尔奖”列入个人发表的“2015年6大好消息”之一。
description.en: On December 18, 2015, Microsoft founder Bill Gates listed 'Tu Youyou and others winning the Nobel Prize' as one of his 'Top 6 Good-News Stories of 2015'.
